org.logi.crypto
Class CryptoException

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.lang.Throwable
        |
        +--java.lang.Exception
              |
              +--org.logi.crypto.CryptoException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CryptoProtocolException, InvalidCDSException, KeyException, PaddingException, SecretSharingException
public class CryptoException
extends java.lang.Exception

This exception or its sub-classes are thrown whenever a cryptographic error occurs.

Author:
Logi Ragnarsson (logir@logi.org)
See Also:
